DOC.criteria: Classification criterion Fibromyalgia ( ACR 1990 ) Sedentary subject ( without regular physical activity last 3 month ) Women 18 65 year old Cardiovascular and/or respiratory disease might limit physical activity ( COPD , Pulmonary Fibrosis , asthma moderate severe , respiratory insufficiency ) ; Organ dysfunction ( renal , hepatic , coronary , pulmonary insufficiency ) ; Arterial hypertension diabetes mellitus ; Uncontrolled thyroid disease ; Autoimmune rheumatic disease and/or nonautoimmune symptom might limit movement physical effort ; The use beta blocker , calcium channel blocker antihypertensive , anticonvulsant ; non tricycles antidepressant ; opioid analgesic include tramadol . cyclobenzaprine > 10 mg/day , amtriptyline > 25 mg/day ; Performing perform exercise within last 3 month ; Inability understand questionnaire ; Positive treadmill test myocardial ischemia ; Receipt social security benefit .
